    private static ITestClass? instance;

    private static ReadOnlySpan<byte> HotReloadHash => "9627b0640bd6b6f1fe38bffa51aefd74"u8;

    public static ITestClass TestClass(this IPythonEnvironment env)
    {
        if (instance is null)
        {
            instance = new TestClassInternal(env.Logger);
        }
        System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(!env.IsDisposed());
        return instance;
    }

    public static void UpdateApplication(Type[]? updatedTypes)
    {
        instance?.ReloadModule();
    }

    private class TestClassInternal : ITestClass
    {
        private PyObject module;
        private readonly ILogger<IPythonEnvironment>? logger;

        private PyObject __func_send_yield;
        private PyObject __func_yield_only;
        private PyObject __func_erroneous_cleanup;

        internal TestClassInternal(ILogger<IPythonEnvironment>? logger)
        {
            this.logger = logger;
            using (GIL.Acquire())
            {
                logger?.LogDebug("Importing module {ModuleName}", "test");
                this.module = ThisModule.Import();
                this.__func_send_yield = module.GetAttr("send_yield");
                this.__func_yield_only = module.GetAttr("yield_only");
                this.__func_erroneous_cleanup = module.GetAttr("erroneous_cleanup");
            }
        }

        void IReloadableModuleImport.ReloadModule()
        {
            logger?.LogDebug("Reloading module {ModuleName}", "test");
            using (GIL.Acquire())
            {
                Import.ReloadModule(ref module);
                // Dispose old functions
                this.__func_send_yield.Dispose();
                this.__func_yield_only.Dispose();
                this.__func_erroneous_cleanup.Dispose();
                // Bind to new functions
                this.__func_send_yield = module.GetAttr("send_yield");
                this.__func_yield_only = module.GetAttr("yield_only");
                this.__func_erroneous_cleanup = module.GetAttr("erroneous_cleanup");
            }
        }

        public void Dispose()
        {
            logger?.LogDebug("Disposing module {ModuleName}", "test");
            this.__func_send_yield.Dispose();
            this.__func_yield_only.Dispose();
            this.__func_erroneous_cleanup.Dispose();
            module.Dispose();
        }

        public IAsyncGeneratorIterator<string, long> SendYield(long length, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
        {
            using (GIL.Acquire())
            {
                this.logger?.LogDebug("Invoking Python function: {FunctionName}", "send_yield");
                PyObject __underlyingPythonFunc = this.__func_send_yield;
                using PyObject length_pyObject = PyObject.From(length)!;
                using PyObject __result_pyObject = __underlyingPythonFunc.Call(length_pyObject);
                var __return = __result_pyObject.BareImportAs<IAsyncGeneratorIterator<string, long>, global::CSnakes.Runtime.Python.PyObjectImporters.AsyncGenerator<string, long, global::CSnakes.Runtime.Python.PyObjectImporters.String>>();
                return __return;
            }
        }

        public IAsyncGeneratorIterator<string, PyObject> YieldOnly(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
        {
            using (GIL.Acquire())
            {
                this.logger?.LogDebug("Invoking Python function: {FunctionName}", "yield_only");
                PyObject __underlyingPythonFunc = this.__func_yield_only;
                using PyObject __result_pyObject = __underlyingPythonFunc.Call();
                var __return = __result_pyObject.BareImportAs<IAsyncGeneratorIterator<string, PyObject>, global::CSnakes.Runtime.Python.PyObjectImporters.AsyncGenerator<string, PyObject, global::CSnakes.Runtime.Python.PyObjectImporters.String>>();
                return __return;
            }
        }

        public IAsyncGeneratorIterator<string, PyObject> ErroneousCleanup(CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
        {
            using (GIL.Acquire())
            {
                this.logger?.LogDebug("Invoking Python function: {FunctionName}", "erroneous_cleanup");
                PyObject __underlyingPythonFunc = this.__func_erroneous_cleanup;
                using PyObject __result_pyObject = __underlyingPythonFunc.Call();

            }
